resources.string: Size/Who: Expressed as a quantity, an echelon, or size.
Activity/What: This line is the focal point of the report and relates to the PIR or important non-PIR information being reported. It should be a concise bullet statement.
Location/Where: Generally a grid coordinate, but can include an address if appropriate.
Location (GPS) is disabled. It is helpful for getting the Report location from the map. \n\nDo you want to enable it now?

Unit/Who: This entry identifies who is performing the activity described. Include the complete designation of a military unit, identification of a civilian or insurgent group, or the full name of an individual, as appropriate.
Time/When: For a future event, this is when the activity will initiate. Ongoing events are reported as such.

Equipment/How: The information reported in this entry clarifies, completes, and/or expands upon information reported in any of the previous entries. It includes information concerning equipment involved, tactics used, and any other essential elements of information.
Use this entry to report the source of the information, whether a person, a CED, open-source media, or other source.
